summary: I WANT TO  CONTINUE WITH THE COMPLAINTS ON SHUDDERING WHEN ACCELERATING  FROM A COMPLETE STOP. I DRIVE FOR UBER/LEFT AND IT'S VERY UNNERVING WHEN I HAVE A RIDER AND THIS HAPPENS. I CAN'T ACCELERATE SAFELY THROUGH AN INTERSECTION BECAUSE OF THE SHUDDERING SOUNDS LIKE THE WHOLE CAR IS GOING TO BREAKDOWN.  PLEASE PLEASE CALL FOR A RECALL ON THIS MATTER.
